archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1477
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer, I want my order of multiple products to be dispatched in multiple shipments when it makes sense to do so, so that I'm not waiting for all my goods if one is delayed, e.g. customer buys in stock phone and pre sales iphone in the same order, we should dispatch his 'in stock' phone right away and the iphone when it arrives in stock a month later.

properties.value: up to customer to decide or up to Brightpoint to decide? This should be an option given for customer in certain scenarios (basic rules) whether he wants to wait and get all in one package or get partial delivery. Note: currently BP sends individual packages anyway. Note: Stock reservation is not available via BP api, pronto API needs to be called (this could be needed in case a customer goes for one future delivery)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
